mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QNA_NO) NUM, Q.* FROM QNA_BOARD Q ORDER BY Q.QNA_REGDATE DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startList} +1 AND #{startList} + #{listSize} -1
SELECT QNA_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REGDATE FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD(QNA_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REGDATE, QNA_SECRET) VALUES(QNA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_nickname}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, SYSDATE, #{qna_secret})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS LISTCNT FROM QNA_BOARD
AND QNA_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
